name: Dodge Bubble
description: Dodge bubble is a casual survival game where the aim of the game is to not get popped!.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 SP1+ Processor: CPU with SSE2 instruction set support Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX 10 (shader model 4.0) DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 100 MB available space Sound Card: Standard Sound card Additional Notes: Game runs in locked 60FPS
